  1. """CMS Plugins for the ``image_gallery`` app."""
  2. from django.utils.translation import ugettext as _
  4. from cms.plugin_base import CMSPluginBase
  5. from cms.plugin_pool import plugin_pool
  6. from filer.models.imagemodels import Image
  8. from image_gallery.models import GalleryPlugin
  11. class CMSGalleryPlugin(CMSPluginBase):
  12. model = GalleryPlugin
  13. name = _('Filer Gallery')
  14. render_template = 'image_gallery/gallery.html'
  16. def get_folder_images(self, folder, user):
  17. qs_files = folder.files.instance_of(Image)
  18. if user.is_staff:
  19. return qs_files
  20. else:
  21. return qs_files.filter(is_public=True)
  23. def render(self, context, instance, placeholder):
  24. context.update({
  25. 'gallery': instance.gallery,
  26. 'images': self.get_folder_images(instance.gallery.folder,
  27. context['request'].user),
  28. 'placeholder': placeholder,
  29. })
  30. return context
  32. plugin_pool.register_plugin(CMSGalleryPlugin)
